smalldesc: In this study program, we will learn web and mobile app development. We'll cover topics like website building, digital business cards, space exploration sites, passenger counter apps, games, GitHub repositories, challenges, deployment, and project sharing. Completing each unit earns karma points for progress and contributions.
largedesc: In this study program, we will cover various topics in web and mobile app development, including building a website, creating a digital business card, designing a space exploration site, developing a passenger counter app, and building a game, among others. We will also learn about GitHub repositories, challenges, deployment, and sharing our projects with the community. Completing each unit will earn karma points, indicating our progress and contributions.

smalldesc: In this course, you'll learn the basics of building Android apps with Jetpack Compose, the new UI toolkit for building Android apps. Along the way, you'll develop a collection of apps to start your journey as an Android developer.
largedesc: In this course, you'll learn the basics of building Android apps with Jetpack Compose, the new UI toolkit for building Android apps. Along the way, you'll develop a collection of apps to start your journey as an Android developer.

smalldesc: Whether you're a beginner or have some prior experience, this bootcamp will equip you with the essential knowledge and skills to bring your game ideas to life.
largedesc:
Welcome  Unreal Engine 5 with Game development course, an immersive program designed to introduce you to the exciting world of game development using Unreal Engine 5. Over the course of this bootcamp, you'll embark on a journey to create a captivating game environment from scratch.
Unreal Engine 5 is a cutting-edge game development platform that empowers developers to create visually stunning and highly interactive experiences. Whether you're a beginner or have some prior experience, this bootcamp will equip you with the essential knowledge and skills to bring your game ideas to life.

smalldesc: This study program offers a concise and practical exploration of User Experience (UX) design. Learn the fundamentals of creating user-centered digital experiences and gain essential skills for designing intuitive interfaces that captivate users.
largedesc:
In this course, you will explore the core concepts of UX design, focusing on understanding user needs, crafting intuitive interfaces, and delivering exceptional user experiences. You will learn the importance of conducting user research, creating user personas, and building wireframes and prototypes to validate design ideas.
Through a combination of lectures, hands-on exercises, and real-world case studies, you will acquire a solid foundation in UX design principles and methodologies. By the end of the course, you will have the skills and knowledge necessary to embark on a career in UX design or enhance your existing design skills in various professional settings.
